QuestData.Title: Venthyr Concordat
QuestData.Description:
<This appears to be an encoded correspondence between a venthyr noble and a Mawsworn lieutenant.
Perhaps Ve'nari can decipher it.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Venthyr Concordat to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Ve'nari glances over the scroll, rotating it in various directions.>
It has been some time since I've seen a method of encryption so intricate. But I suppose the venthyr are nothing if not ostentatious.
Whatever the contents of this message might be, it is clear that its author wanted to keep it clandestine.
